entries.headline: Fresh Paint & New Header
entries.blurb: The frontend got a massive glow-up with a unified header, user controls, and a shiny new AI theme bar. It's looking fresh!

entries.headline: Drop the Beat
entries.blurb: Added 'elevenmusic' to the audio lineup. Now you can generate full instrumental tracks and bangers directly from the API.

entries.headline: Voices with Feeling
entries.blurb: Upgraded our text-to-speech to ElevenLabs v3. The robots now have 70+ languages and a lot more emotional range.

entries.headline: The AI Has Ears
entries.blurb: Integrated Whisper Large V3 for speech-to-text. The hive can now transcribe your audio with impressive accuracy.

entries.headline: Meet Polly the Bot
entries.blurb: Deployed Polly to our Discord serverâ€”a clever little bot bridging community chat with our GitHub development.

entries.headline: Tuning the Image Engines
entries.blurb: Gave Flux Klein and Sana a tune-up under the hood. Expect better stability and higher quality pixels in your generations.

entries.headline: Unsquashing the Art
entries.blurb: Fixed a quirk in Klein-9B that was forcing non-square images into a box. Your aspect ratios are safe again.
